about_the_game:
Forest Horror is an addictive horror game that will immerse you in a world of horror.
You have to explore the mysterious forest and complete many tasks to get out of there alive.
However, danger and fear await at every step. The forest is abandoned and filled with monsters.
You will pass through the deep wilds of this forest.
You will pass through abandoned buildings, see cars that have become a pile of iron.
But be careful, the monsters are already waiting for you and the most terrible trials of your life are waiting for you.
Can you get out of this forest alive? Find out in Forest Horror and take this test track.
All in all, Forest Horror is a real challenge for horror fans.
The forest creates a suffocating atmosphere, and the monsters keep you in suspense throughout the entire passage of the game.
Can you get out of the forest? Try your hand at Forest Horror and immerse yourself in this horror adventure!
Game Features:
1. Nice graphics.
2. Interesting gameplay.
3. Large location where you can move freely.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU G530 @2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU G530 @2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 mb
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
